verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Blessed be the name of the Lord.
(4x) (ladies echo)

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: For He is our Rock, He is our Rock, He is the Lord. (2x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
// Jesus reigns on high in all the earth. (echo)
Jesus reigns on high in all the earth. (echo) //

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: // The universe is in the hands of the Lord. //
